segments.text: I notice the kitchen layout, with cabinets on one side and sink on the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is positioned by the sink, holding a plate and towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet water is flowing steadily into the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over the edge, creating a sheet of water down the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is on a step stool, accessing the open upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling from the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool appears tilted, which catches my eye suddenly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby has her arm extended toward him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked neatly on the counter to the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above shows a garden path with bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, letting in light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's a typical home setting with some activity.
segments.speaker: PAR
